00014   void LinearFitter::fitInitialisation(const TMatrixD &z, const TMatrixDSym &e) {
00015     assert(e.GetNcols()==z.GetNrows());
00016 
00017     const bool print(false);
00018     
00019     const unsigned nLayers(z.GetNrows());
00020     const unsigned nParams(z.GetNcols());
00021     
00022     _fitValues.ResizeTo(z.GetNrows(),z.GetNcols());
00023     _fitValues=z;
00024     
00025     if(print) {
00026       std::cout << "LinearFitter::fitErrors() "
00027                 << "z matrix" << std::endl;
00028       for(unsigned i(0);i<nLayers;i++) {
00029         for(unsigned j(0);j<nParams;j++) {
00030           std::cout << std::setw(13) << z(i,j);
00031         }
00032         std::cout << std::endl;
00033       }
00034     }
00035     
00036     TMatrixD zt(nParams,nLayers); // p x l
00037     zt.Transpose(z);
00038     
00039     if(print) {
00040       std::cout << "LinearFitter::fitErrors() "
00041                 << "Transposed z matrix" << std::endl;
00042       for(unsigned i(0);i<nParams;i++) {
00043         for(unsigned j(0);j<nLayers;j++) {
00044           std::cout << std::setw(13) << zt(i,j);
00045         }
00046         std::cout << std::endl;
00047       }
00048     }
00049     
00050     if(print) {
00051       std::cout << "LinearFitter::fitErrors() "
00052                 << "Layer error matrix" << std::endl;
00053       for(unsigned i(0);i<nLayers;i++) {
00054         for(unsigned j(0);j<nLayers;j++) {
00055           std::cout << std::setw(13) << e(i,j);
00056         }
00057         std::cout << std::endl;
00058       }
00059     }
00060     
00061     TMatrixDSym Wc(e); // l x l
00062     Wc.Invert();
00063     
00064     if(print) {
00065       std::cout << "LinearFitter::fitErrors() "
00066                 << "Layer weight matrix" << std::endl;
00067       for(unsigned i(0);i<nLayers;i++) {
00068         for(unsigned j(0);j<nLayers;j++) {
00069           std::cout << std::setw(13) << Wc(i,j);
00070         }
00071         std::cout << std::endl;
00072     }
00073     }
00074     
00075     TMatrixD v(Wc*z); // l x p
00076     TMatrixD vt(nParams,nLayers); // p x l
00077     vt.Transpose(v);
00078     
00079     _errorMatrix.ResizeTo(nParams,nParams); // p x p
00080     _errorMatrix.Zero();
00081     
00082     TMatrixD ep(zt*v); // p x p
00083     //_errorMatrix=zt*v;
00084     /*
00085       for(unsigned m(0);m<nParams;m++) {
00086       for(unsigned n(0);n<nParams;n++) {
00087       for(unsigned l(0);l<nLayers;l++) {
00088       _errorMatrix(m,n)+=zt(m,l)*v(l,n);
00089       }
00090       }
00091       }
00092     */
00093     for(unsigned m(0);m<nParams;m++) {
00094       for(unsigned n(0);n<nParams;n++) {
00095         _errorMatrix(m,n)=ep(m,n);
00096       }
00097     }
00098     
00099     if(print) {
00100       std::cout << "LinearFitter::fitErrors() "
00101                 << "Parameter weight matrix" << std::endl;
00102       for(unsigned i(0);i<nParams;i++) {
00103         for(unsigned j(0);j<nParams;j++) {
00104           std::cout << std::setw(13) << _errorMatrix(i,j);
00105         }
00106         std::cout << std::endl;
00107       }
00108     }
00109     
00110     _errorMatrix.Invert();
00111     
00112     if(print) {
00113       std::cout << "LinearFitter::fitErrors() "
00114                 << "Parameter error matrix" << std::endl;
00115       for(unsigned i(0);i<nParams;i++) {
00116         for(unsigned j(0);j<nParams;j++) {
00117           std::cout << std::setw(13) << _errorMatrix(i,j);
00118         }
00119         std::cout << std::endl;
00120       }
00121     }
00122     
00123     _solutionMatrix.ResizeTo(nParams,nLayers); // p x l
00124     _solutionMatrix=_errorMatrix*vt;
00125     
00126     if(print) {
00127       std::cout << "LinearFitter::fitErrors() "
00128                 << "Solution matrix" << std::endl;
00129       for(unsigned i(0);i<nParams;i++) {
00130         for(unsigned j(0);j<nLayers;j++) {
00131           std::cout << std::setw(13) << _solutionMatrix(i,j);
00132         }
00133         std::cout << std::endl;
00134       }
00135     }
00136     
00137     _chiSquaredMatrix.ResizeTo(nLayers,nLayers); // l x l
00138     _chiSquaredMatrix=Wc;
00139     
00140     //_chiSquaredMatrix-=v*_solutionMatrix;
00141     
00142     TMatrixD dc(v*_solutionMatrix);
00143     for(unsigned i(0);i<nLayers;i++) {
00144       for(unsigned j(0);j<nLayers;j++) {
00145         _chiSquaredMatrix(i,j)-=dc(i,j);
00146       }
00147     }
00148     
00149     if(print) {
00150       std::cout << "LinearFitter::fitErrors() "
00151                 << "Chi-squared matrix" << std::endl;
00152       for(unsigned i(0);i<nLayers;i++) {
00153         for(unsigned j(0);j<nLayers;j++) {
00154           std::cout << std::setw(13) << _chiSquaredMatrix(i,j);
00155         }
00156         std::cout << std::endl;
00157       }
00158     }
00159   }

00162     return _errorMatrix;

00166     return _solutionMatrix;

00172 
00173   std::ostream& LinearFitter::printInitialisation(std::ostream &o, const std::string &s) const {
00174     o << "LinearFitter::printInitialisation()" << std::endl;
00175     
00176     o << " Fit value matrix" << std::endl;
00177     for(int i(0);i<_fitValues.GetNrows();i++) {
00178       o << "  ";
00179       for(int j(0);j<_fitValues.GetNcols();j++) {
00180         o << std::setw(13) << _fitValues(i,j);
00181       }
00182       o << std::endl;
00183     }
00184     
00185     o << " Parameter error matrix" << std::endl;
00186     for(int i(0);i<_errorMatrix.GetNrows();i++) {
00187       o << "  ";
00188       for(int j(0);j<_errorMatrix.GetNcols();j++) {
00189         o << std::setw(13) << _errorMatrix(i,j);
00190       }
00191       o << std::endl;
00192     }
00193     
00194     o << " Parameter normalised error matrix" << std::endl;
00195     for(int i(0);i<_errorMatrix.GetNrows();i++) {
00196       o << "  ";
00197       for(int j(0);j<_errorMatrix.GetNcols();j++) {
00198         if(j==i) o << std::setw(13) << sqrt(_errorMatrix(i,i));
00199         else     o << std::setw(13) << _errorMatrix(i,j)/sqrt(_errorMatrix(i,i)*_errorMatrix(j,j));
00200       }
00201       o << std::endl;
00202     }
00203     
00204     o << " Solution matrix" << std::endl;
00205     for(int i(0);i<_solutionMatrix.GetNrows();i++) {
00206       o << "  ";
00207       for(int j(0);j<_solutionMatrix.GetNcols();j++) {
00208         o << std::setw(13) << _solutionMatrix(i,j);
00209       }
00210       o << std::endl;
00211     }
00212     
00213     o << " Chi-squared matrix" << std::endl;
00214     for(int i(0);i<_chiSquaredMatrix.GetNrows();i++) {
00215       o << "  ";
00216       for(int j(0);j<_chiSquaredMatrix.GetNcols();j++) {
00217         o << std::setw(13) << _chiSquaredMatrix(i,j);
00218       }
00219       o << std::endl;
00220     }
00221     
00222     o << std::endl;
00223     
00224     return o;
00225   }
00226   
00227   LinearFitResult LinearFitter::fitResult(const TVectorD &x) const {
00228     assert(_solutionMatrix.GetNcols()  ==x.GetNrows());
00229     assert(_chiSquaredMatrix.GetNcols()==x.GetNrows());
00230     
00231     return LinearFitResult(x*(_chiSquaredMatrix*x),
00232                            _solutionMatrix.GetNcols()-_solutionMatrix.GetNrows(),
00233                            _solutionMatrix*x,
00234                            _errorMatrix);
00235   }

00243   TMatrixDSym LinearFitter::functionErrors() const {
00244     return functionErrors(_fitValues);

00247   TMatrixDSym LinearFitter::functionErrors(const TMatrixD &z) const {
00248     assert(_errorMatrix.GetNcols()==z.GetNrows());
00249     
00250     TMatrixD zt(z.GetNcols(),z.GetNrows());
00251     zt.Transpose(z);
00252     
00253     TMatrixD zez(zt*_errorMatrix*z);
00254     
00255     TMatrixDSym e(zez.GetNcols());

00257       for(int j(0);j<e.GetNcols();j++) {
00258         e(i,j)=zez(i,j);
00259       }
00260     }
00261     
00262     return e;
00263   }
00264 
00265   double LinearFitter::chiSquared() const {
00266     return _chiSquared;
00267   }
00268 
00269   int LinearFitter::numberOfDof() const {
00270     return _solutionMatrix.GetNcols()-_solutionMatrix.GetNrows();
00271   }
00272 
00273   double LinearFitter::probability() const {
00274     return TMath::Prob(_chiSquared,numberOfDof());
00275   }
00276
